worker.result_worker module¶

This module fetches results out of the queue_manager and formats it in JSON to add it to da database

class Database[source]¶

Bases: object

This is the database wrapper class. An instance of it holds the connection to the Database and contains methods for operations on the Database.

Putting result to The Database.

Parameters:scan – the result of the current scan.
